text: in vegas you can find wonderfully delicious pizza that is said to be among the finest along with regular specials on great beers

the worst fills over been to trash was not emptied windshield cleaner was out  squeegee was old  terrible

the quality of this chinese food is absolutely abysmal from the tasteless wonton soup to the undercooked meat and dumplings that strangely resemble playdoh it has been the most disappointing culinary encounter of my life and i vow to never step foot in this establishment again
service was slightly sluggish and the food fell short of expectations
large store  great selection  not too busy so its easy to find a representative if you have questions

the level of customer service at this place is absolutely abysmal its hard to fathom that it could be any worse my pizza order was completely mishandled leaving me emptyhanded without a replacement on top of that they had the audacity to deliver a pizza with the opposite toppings that i requested considering their consistently tardy deliveries and lack of reliability one could reluctantly deem this establishment passable when desperate or under the influence

the behavior of all three waiters that attended to us was incredibly rude and to make matters worse the calamari was absolutely awful the chili was undercooked and only the muscles and wings were tolerable needless to say i ended up feeling very disappointed

you cannot go wrong with this spot if youre in search of superbly fresh produce and fish their service has always been commendable without fail make sure to schedule your visit on a wednesday as it presents the perfect opportunity to benefit from the justended last weeks sales and the newlylaunched sales of the current week all bundled into one single day

the place was extremely crowded and had an unpleasant odor the drink i had was average and the price was reasonable unfortunately someone accidentally spilled my drink because they couldnt take their eyes off my wife as she danced on the bar i can understand why it happened and to his credit he did buy me another drink however i doubt ill return to that place

it seems like the establishment has gone out of business as their phones have been turned off and their website has been down for the past week when they were operating they were wellregarded for serving cheap americanized fast food chinese dishes i feel upset about this situation and currently i am searching for another dive chinese place that offers delivery services to arcadia

returning to this establishment is out of the question due to their appalling customer service its astonishing how they managed to mess up my pizza order so terribly that they didnt bother sending me a replacement instead delivering a pizza with the wrong toppings even though their delivery service is regularly delayed and their schedule unreliable one could argue that this place might suffice as a last resort especially if intoxicated

while recognized as a strip joint it additionally serves as a fullfledged steakhouse where the dancers make sure to keep their bottoms covered the prospect of experiencing this intriguing combination excited me personally however disappointingly they made us wait excessively for our table despite having a reservation consequently we missed the chance to enjoy the peep show and sample their delectable steaks â€” truly a regrettable outcome

this particular location is notorious for being infested with untrustworthy fraudulent individuals particularly within the management team their dubious tactics involve coercing customers into signing up for expensive maintenance plans which leads to a revolving door of employees who are repeatedly sent to sell an assortment of unnecessary items it is highly recommended to avoid engaging with this establishment at all costs
being a firsttimer at oreganos i found their pizza to be satisfactory but not exceptional it made me contemplate trying something else on my next venture there

theres no question that if youre looking for the ultimate genuinely mexican meal in las vegas at a reasonable price tacos el gordo is the answer dont be surprised if you find yourself craving seconds after enjoying their mouthwatering first serving of tacos this hidden gem can easily compete with any other mexican eatery ive tried in southern california known for being the goto destination for truly authentic mexican delicacies
this place is renowned for its exceptional food  the bread salads and soups are simply outstanding

despite its classification as a strip club this establishment also operates as a steakhouse with the dancers maintaining their bottoms on display personally i was eager to have this unique experience but our table reservation was disregarded leading to a wait of over 30 minutes hence we were unable to witness the peep show or get a taste of their renowned steaks  what a missed opportunity

over the passage of time dtg has transformed into a more pleasurable place enhanced by attractions like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters to just name a couple despite the difficulties presented by the recession many shops have fared quite well and a notable number are making a comeback being a resident of glendale brings me joy and i eagerly look forward to experiencing many more delightful occasions in dtg

horrible customer service  to make a long story shorti will go out of my way to find a different coffee place next time  the barista was friendly but the supervisor i think with short blond hair has a bit of an attitude problem

i cant believe how awful that chinese food was it was the worst ive ever tried the wonton soup had absolutely no taste the meat was not cooked properly and the dumplings felt and tasted like playdoh i will definitely avoid eating there again

wow this barerrr convenience store is popping on friday nights  i just stopped by for a quick break on a bike ride so i didnt get to thoroughly assess this location   it has a really cool courtyard that is a great place to hang out in the evening  ill have to update my review when i get to see more

considering the scarcity of chinese dining establishments in this vicinity your best bet would be this restaurant however the cost may be on the steeper side without much to set it apart from other places
oreganos was uncharted territory for me and though the pizza was good it didnt quite meet my expectations perhaps i should consider exploring other choices during my next experience there

over time the appeal of downtown glendale has been on the rise with events like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters just to name a couple despite the recession many shops have successfully weathered the storm and even more are making a comeback as a resident of glendale i am thrilled to be part of this community and eagerly look forward to the abundance of fun activities in dtg for years to come
this show is bound to captivate kids with its greatness

its unfortunate that my 200th review has to be for this generic american irish bar although the music selection was decent it didnt match the environment the service lacked attentiveness and my booth seat was collapsing around me the restroom was absolutely disgusting to top it off a minuscule whiskey cranberry drink set me back 7 overall i wont be returning
the food is excellent the hostess is delightful there is beautiful green grass in the backyard to enhance the ambiance and manny is exceptionally skilled at voice acting

this establishment is packed with untruthful deceitful swindlers especially in the management position if they manage to trick you into their maintenance plan be aware that their employee turnover rate is exceptionally high and you will constantly encounter new salespeople trying to sell you anything and everything it is strongly advised to stay away from this place

my family and i were very excited to try curry garden unfortunately i got a peak back in the kitchen not very sanitary to say the least its too bad because this place was recommended by people we dine with all the time i was unimpressed to say the least

this area has limited options when it comes to chinese cuisine so if youre craving it youll have to rely on this particular restaurant if you decide to go be prepared for higher prices and a somewhat mediocre experience

from my understanding it appears that the business has closed down as their phones have been disconnected and their website has been inaccessible for the past week previously they were known for their affordable americanized fast food chinese cuisine i feel saddened by this development and now i am actively looking for another local chinese restaurant that can deliver food to arcadia

unquestionably tacos el gordo stands out as the ultimate destination in las vegas for a remarkable and truly authentic mexican feast that wont break the bank after indulging in your initial serving of delectable tacos youll find yourself irresistibly drawn to return for another round this place effortlessly competes with anything ive ever experienced in southern california known as the mecca of genuine mexican gastronomy

after hearing many positive things about this place i was curious to experience it myself and see what the buzz was about unfortunately i ended up feeling very let down by everything the wing sauce was predominantly oil and lacked any enjoyable flavor its better to save your money and avoid eating here
the service could have been faster and the food didnt really impress me

the management of this establishment known for their deceitful practices is filled with dishonest individuals they often manipulate customers into purchasing unnecessary maintenance plans resulting in a consistently high turnover of employees who are constantly being dispatched to sell various products and services it is strongly advised to steer clear from this place

we stopped in for a bite 21214 after a visit to the hot springs in a word disgusting the table was sticky the windows were dirty there were stains on the walls it was gross this was a nice place with good truck stop style food i dont know what happened but well never go back

if there was an option to rate this less than one star i would gladly choose it i placed an order for some pizzas to be delivered to my office and i clearly remember being informed on the phone that the estimated delivery time would be between 30 and 45 minutes it has now been two full hours since then and we are sitting here with no signs of our food this entire ordeal has left us extremely disappointed with the service provided by glass nickel pizza and we have firmly decided that we will not be placing any future orders from them

i went here for lunch got a cold blue moon on tap i then went to the fish taco and cesar salad combo it was a great salad and probably the best fish tacos i have ever had these arent street tacos these are elegant tacos done high class taste and quality nni will be backfor sure
